languages.text: Крупные силы повстанцев скрывались в джунглях, покрывающих Янус. В этих малолюдных областях располагались основные аграрные мощности колонии, прикрываясь которыми боевики получали свободу действия и могли совершать налеты. Стражи губернатора Вьятт обладали низким уровнем подготовки и умения действовать в подобной местности.

traits.locale_text: Крупные силы повстанцев скрывались в джунглях, покрывающих Янус. В этих малолюдных областях располагались основные аграрные мощности колонии, прикрываясь которыми боевики получали свободу действия и могли совершать налеты. Силы планетарной обороны губернатора Вьятт обладали низким уровнем подготовки и умения действовать в подобной местности.

languages.text: The main rebel forces were hiding in the jungles that blanketed Janus. These sparsely populated regions were home to the colony's key agricultural facilities, which the fighters used as cover for their actions, allowing them to carry out incursions. Governor Vyatt's wardens lacked the training and skills to operate in such conditions.
languages.original_text: Крупные силы повстанцев скрывались в джунглях, покрывающих Янус. В этих малолюдных областях располагались основные аграрные мощности колонии, прикрываясь которыми боевики получали свободу действия и могли совершать налеты. Стражи губернатора Вьятт обладали низким уровнем подготовки и умения действовать в подобной местности.

traits.locale_text: The main rebel forces were hiding in the jungles that blanketed Janus. These sparsely populated regions were home to the colony's key agricultural facilities, which the fighters used as cover for their actions, allowing them to carry out incursions. Governor Vyatt's planetary defense forces lacked the training and skills to operate in such conditions.

The main rebel forces were hiding in the jungles that blanketed Janus. These sparsely populated regions were home to the colony's key agricultural facilities, which the fighters used as cover for their actions, allowing them to carry out incursions. Governor Vyatt's planetary defense forces lacked the training and skills to operate in such conditions.

The main rebel forces were hiding in the jungles that blanketed Janus. These sparsely populated regions were home to the colony's key agricultural facilities, which the fighters used as cover for their actions, allowing them to carry out incursions. Governor Vyatt's planetary defense forces lacked the training and skills to operate in such conditions.

The main rebel forces were hiding in the jungles that blanketed Janus. These sparsely populated regions were home to the colony's key agricultural facilities, which the fighters used as cover for their actions, allowing them to carry out incursions. Governor Vyatt's soldiers lacked the training and skills to operate in such conditions.

The main rebel forces were hiding in the jungles that blanketed Janus. These sparsely populated regions were home to the colony's key agricultural facilities, which the fighters used as cover for their actions, allowing them to carry out incursions. Governor Vyatt's wardens lacked the training and skills to operate in such conditions.

languages.text: 反乱軍の主力はヤヌスを覆うジャングルに隠れていた。まばらに点在するジャングルには、コロニーの重要な農業施設があるものの、その施設は反乱軍の兵の隠れ家に利用され、反乱軍による襲撃を許した。このような条件下での作戦遂行にあたり、総督ビャットのワーデンは訓練も技能も不足していた。
languages.original_text: The main rebel forces were hiding in the jungles that blanketed Janus. These sparsely populated regions were home to the colony's key agricultural facilities, which the fighters used as cover for their actions, allowing them to carry out incursions. Governor Vyatt's wardens lacked the training and skills to operate in such conditions.

traits.locale_text: 反乱軍の主力はヤヌスを覆うジャングルに隠れていた。まばらに点在するジャングルには、コロニーの重要な農業施設があるものの、その施設は反乱軍の兵の隠れ家に利用され、反乱軍による襲撃を許した。このような条件下での作戦遂行にあたり、総督ビャットのワーデンは訓練も技能も不足していた。

languages.text: 叛军主力藏匿在加努斯的存林之中。这些地区人烟稀少，是殖民地重要农业设施的所在地，叛军战士们利用这些设施作为行动掩护，从而得以实施入侵。维亚特总督的守卫缺少足够的训练与技能，无法在这样的情况下展开行动。
languages.original_text: The main rebel forces were hiding in the jungles that blanketed Janus. These sparsely populated regions were home to the colony's key agricultural facilities, which the fighters used as cover for their actions, allowing them to carry out incursions. Governor Vyatt's wardens lacked the training and skills to operate in such conditions.

traits.locale_text: 叛军主力藏匿在加努斯的存林之中。这些地区人烟稀少，是殖民地重要农业设施的所在地，叛军战士们利用这些设施作为行动掩护，从而得以实施入侵。维亚特总督的守卫缺少足够的训练与技能，无法在这样的情况下展开行动。

languages.text: El grueso de las fuerzas rebeldes se ocultaba en las junglas que cubrían Janus. Aquellas regiones escasamente pobladas albergaban las principales instalaciones agrícolas de la colonia; los guerrilleros las usaban de tapadera para encubrir sus actividades y lanzar incursiones. Las fuerzas de la gobernadora Vyatt carecían del entrenamiento y las habilidades necesarias para operar en tales condiciones.
languages.original_text: The main rebel forces were hiding in the jungles that blanketed Janus. These sparsely populated regions were home to the colony's key agricultural facilities, which the fighters used as cover for their actions, allowing them to carry out incursions. Governor Vyatt's wardens lacked the training and skills to operate in such conditions.

traits.locale_text: El grueso de las fuerzas rebeldes se ocultaba en las junglas que cubrían Janus. Aquellas regiones escasamente pobladas albergaban las principales instalaciones agrícolas de la colonia; los guerrilleros las usaban de tapadera para encubrir sus actividades y lanzar incursiones. Las fuerzas de la gobernadora Vyatt carecían del entrenamiento y las habilidades necesarias para operar en tales condiciones.

languages.text: Der Großteil der Rebellenkräfte versteckte sich in den Dschungeln auf Janus. In diesen kaum besiedelten Regionen befinden sich die zentralen landwirtschaftlichen Anlagen der Kolonie, die die Kämpfer als Tarnung benutzten und von denen aus sie ihre Vorstöße starteten. Den Wächtern von Gouverneurin Vyatt mangelte es an Ausbildung und Fertigkeiten, um unter diesen Bedingungen zu operieren.
languages.original_text: The main rebel forces were hiding in the jungles that blanketed Janus. These sparsely populated regions were home to the colony's key agricultural facilities, which the fighters used as cover for their actions, allowing them to carry out incursions. Governor Vyatt's wardens lacked the training and skills to operate in such conditions.

traits.locale_text: Der Großteil der Rebellenkräfte versteckte sich in den Dschungeln auf Janus. In diesen kaum besiedelten Regionen befinden sich die zentralen landwirtschaftlichen Anlagen der Kolonie, die die Kämpfer als Tarnung benutzten und von denen aus sie ihre Vorstöße starteten. Den Wächtern von Gouverneurin Vyatt mangelte es an Ausbildung und Fertigkeiten, um unter diesen Bedingungen zu operieren.

languages.text: Le gros des forces des rebelles se cachait dans la jungle recouvrant la surface de Janus. Ces zones peu peuplées abritaient les principaux bâtiments agricoles de la colonie, que les combattants utilisaient pour préparer leurs opérations en toute discrétion et lancer des incursions, mais les gardiens de la gouverneure Vyatt n'avaient ni l'entraînement ni les compétences requises pour agir efficacement dans de telles conditions.
languages.original_text: The main rebel forces were hiding in the jungles that blanketed Janus. These sparsely populated regions were home to the colony's key agricultural facilities, which the fighters used as cover for their actions, allowing them to carry out incursions. Governor Vyatt's wardens lacked the training and skills to operate in such conditions.

traits.locale_text: Le gros des forces des rebelles se cachait dans la jungle recouvrant la surface de Janus. Ces zones peu peuplées abritaient les principaux bâtiments agricoles de la colonie, que les combattants utilisaient pour préparer leurs opérations en toute discrétion et lancer des incursions, mais les gardiens de la gouverneure Vyatt n'avaient ni l'entraînement ni les compétences requises pour agir efficacement dans de telles conditions.

languages.text: Ana isyancı kuvvetleri, Janus'u sarıp çevreleyen ormanlarda saklanıyordu; bu dağınık grupların bulunduğu bölge, koloninin en önemli tarımsal tesislerine ev sahipliği yapıyordu. Savaşçılar burada güven içinde bekliyor, akınlarını kolaylıkla gerçekleştirebiliyordu. Vali Vyatt'ın dizdarları ise bu koşullarda faaliyet gösteremeyecek kadar eğitimsiz ve vasıfsızdı.
languages.original_text: The main rebel forces were hiding in the jungles that blanketed Janus. These sparsely populated regions were home to the colony's key agricultural facilities, which the fighters used as cover for their actions, allowing them to carry out incursions. Governor Vyatt's wardens lacked the training and skills to operate in such conditions.

traits.locale_text: Ana isyancı kuvvetleri, Janus'u sarıp çevreleyen ormanlarda saklanıyordu; bu dağınık grupların bulunduğu bölge, koloninin en önemli tarımsal tesislerine ev sahipliği yapıyordu. Savaşçılar burada güven içinde bekliyor, akınlarını kolaylıkla gerçekleştirebiliyordu. Vali Vyatt'ın muhafızları ise bu koşullarda faaliyet gösteremeyecek kadar eğitimsiz ve vasıfsızdı.
